select suerhair.PARTNER_ID,suerhair.AUTH_ID,suerhair.AUTH_NAME, decode(suerhair.REAL_PHONE,'','', (substr(suerhair.REAL_PHONE,'0','3') || '****' || substr(suerhair.REAL_PHONE,length(suerhair.REAL_PHONE)-3,length(suerhair.REAL_PHONE)))) REAL_PHONE, suerhair.REQ_NO,suerhair.REQ_TIME, case when suerhair.ISSUE_STATUS ='0' then '完成' when suerhair.ISSUE_STATUS ='2' then '失败' else '' end ISSUE_STATUS, suerhair.CAR_NO, decode(suerhair.CARD_NO,'','',substr(suerhair.CARD_NO,'0','6') || '****' || substr(suerhair.CARD_NO,length(suerhair.CARD_NO)-3,length(suerhair.CARD_NO))) CARD_NO, suerhair.PHONE, decode(suerhair.ID,'','',substr(suerhair.ID,'0','6')|| '****' || substr(suerhair.ID,length(suerhair.ID)-3,length(suerhair.ID))) ID, case when length(suerhair.REAL_NAME) <= 2 then substr(suerhair.REAL_NAME,'0','1') || '*' when length(suerhair.REAL_NAME) > 2 then substr(suerhair.REAL_NAME,'0','1') || '*' || substr(suerhair.REAL_NAME,length(suerhair.REAL_NAME),length(suerhair.REAL_NAME)-1) else '' end REAL_NAME, suerhair.ISSUE_MSG, suerhair.FINISH_TIME, case WHEN suerhair.DELIVERY_METHOD='1' then '快递' WHEN suerhair.DELIVERY_METHOD='2' then '自提' else '' end DELIVERY_METHOD, suerhair.LICENSE_COLOR, paruser.REFERER, paruser.SERVICE_ADDRESS, partner.PARTNER_NAME from T_ETC_ISSUE suerhair left join T_ETC_PARTNER_USER paruser on suerhair.auth_id = paruser.user_id left join T_ETC_PARTNER_INFO partner on suerhair.PARTNER_ID = partner.PARTNER_ID
ISSUE_STATUS ='0'
AND suerhair.AUTH_ID like '%' || #{usrh.authId} || '%'
AND suerhair.PARTNER_ID = #{usrh.partnerId}
AND suerhair.AUTH_NAME like '%' || #{usrh.authName} || '%'
AND suerhair.REQ_NO like '%' || #{usrh.orderNo} || '%'
AND suerhair.ISSUE_STATUS like '%' || #{usrh.signsStatus} || '%'
AND suerhair.FINISH_TIME between #{usrh.queryTimeStart} and #{usrh.queryTimeEnd}
and suerhair.PARTNER_ID = #{usrh.userPartnerId}
and CAR_NO like '%' || #{usrh.carNo} || '%'
order by FINISH_TIME desc
